CREATE DATABASE updatawarehouse;
GO

USE updatawarehouse;
GO

--Paso 01
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'p39345ghJ#KL95909234nl0zBe'
GO

--Paso 02
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL UPJordandios WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
SECRET = '?sv=2022-11-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2023-12-31T08:44:11Z&st=2023-12-07T00:44:11Z&spr=https&sig=kXE21Qp4IvMRIXaUSLA1CVGVLW3ZKzLTA%2BG%2Fcv0r284%3D'
GO

-- Paso 03
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ExternalUPDataSource
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dlsupdsjjdmdevm1z.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = UPJordandios
);
GO

-- Paso 04
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPParquetFileFormat 
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT UPCSVWithHEADERFORMAT
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '|',
        STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
        FIRST_ROW = 2)
)
